Glover Park Hardware Loses Its Longtime Lease

By Brady HoltCurrent Staff Writer

Glover Park Hardware announced Monday that it must abruptly relocate from its longtime location at 2251 Wisconsin Ave. next month, having lost its lease for the property with no replacement site yet determined.

By Graham VyseCurrent Staff Writer

GU Research Shows Menthol Cigarettes Desensitize Lungs

Neuroscientists at Georgetown University (GU) say menthol and nicotine work together to desensitize receptors in the lungs’ airways, possibly encouraging people to inhale menthol cigarettes more deeply and exposing them to more toxins.
